column4: how do i have ubuntu auto log in and then have a script that plays a song? I'm planning on using my compter as a type of alarm clock, I have my bios auto turn the computer on at a certain time so that is of no matter.
For autologin, System -> Administration -> Login Screen has an option. For playing a song, run totem or something at login (see the message from ubottu) specifying the file you want to play.
